1.12.2.1.2.0:
- Added a config option to set a y-level for when the darkness will begin to damage you
- Improved the skylight checks (courtesy of Laike Endaril)
1.12.2.1.1.0:
- Added support for Dynamic Lights (and a confg option to disable said compatibility)
- Added support for Game Stages (the config file has two lists where you can specify stages where the darkness hurts you and stages where it doesn't)
- Added a config option to convert the dimension whitelist into a blacklist
